body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Thomas Simmons and the customer's name is Patricia Parker.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Bright Horizons Customer Support. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I need some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help you with that. Could I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. For verification purposes, could you please provide me with the last four digits of your Social Security number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also confirm the zip code associated with your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's nine eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have verified your account. How can I assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need to update my email address on file.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help you with that. What is the new email address you would like to use?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have updated your email address. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, John. If you have any other questions, feel free to call us back. Have a great day!
